FuncDef:
The flow-statistic frequency value-added-service statistic-type car command configures a board to read EDSG service traffic statistics at a configured rate.
The undo flow-statistic frequency value-added-service command restores the default configuration.
By default, a board can read 52 EDSG CAR statistics at an interval of 200 ms.
CLIs: undo flow-statistic frequency value-added-service [ <speed> statistic-type car ]

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the number of EDSG services for which traffic statistics are collected every 200 ms.
The value is an integer ranging from 52 to 500.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To improve the statistical precision of service traffic in scenarios where CAR is performed on upstream and downstream EDSG services, run the flow-statistic frequency value-added-service command to increase the statistical rate.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
